stories.title: Frontmatter Infrastructure + YAML Migration
stories.description: Implement YAML frontmatter parser, define schemas for all file types, migrate default.yml to markdown format (general-coding-standards.md, language profiles), update profile loader for markdown, add section-level enforcement detection, maintain /review file compatibility. Deliverable: /review file works with markdown profiles, YAML deprecated.

stories.title: Auto-Detection in hodge init
stories.description: Implement language detection (tsconfig.json, package.json), framework detection (dependencies parsing), testing tool detection (vitest, jest, pytest), generate .hodge/review-config.md with detected profiles, add auto-detection output to hodge init, preserve manual edits. Deliverable: hodge init auto-generates review-config.md.

stories.title: Reusable Profile Library
stories.description: Create 8+ reusable profiles: general-coding-standards.md (SRP, DRY, coupling), languages/javascript.md, languages/typescript.md, languages/python.md, tech-stacks/react.md, tech-stacks/vue.md, tech-stacks/api-design.md, tech-stacks/test-quality.md. Ship with Hodge framework, document creation pattern. Deliverable: Rich profile library ships with Hodge.

stories.title: Composition System + Future Enablement
stories.description: Implement precedence rules (project overrides profiles), optimize context loading, add composition logging, enable future scope expansion (directory/pattern/recent), document harden integration pattern, add conflict resolution tests. Deliverable: Full composition system, ready for scope expansion.
